questions.question: What is the function of the third conditional in English?
options: To express regrets or hypothetical situations in the past.
questions.answer: To express regrets or hypothetical situations in the past.

questions.question: Choose the correct form: 'If we had known about the traffic, we _____ a different route.'
Identify the third conditional sentence:
options: If I see her, I will tell her.
If I had known she was sick, I would have visited her.
If I know the answer, I tell you.
If I were you, I would study more.
questions.answer: If I had known she was sick, I would have visited her.
